raw_comment: The southern states get flowers, and plants earlier than the northern states. Also I noticed that the western states have more diversity in when they sprout.  Additionally, where we live, in MD the flowers, and greenery ARE blooming And sprouting when the chart says so. Therefore I can infer that this chart is accurate.
ace_sentences: The southern states get flowers and plants earlier than the northern states.
I noticed that the western states have more diversity in sprouting times.
In Maryland, the flowers bloom when the chart says so.
In Maryland, the greenery sprouts when the chart says so.
Therefore, I infer that the chart is accurate.
